00056 Ecode_t ezradioStartDirectReceive(EZRADIODRV_Handle_t radioHandle )
00057 {
00058   if ( radioHandle == NULL )
00059   {
00060     return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00061   }
00062 
00063   /* Read ITs, clear pending ones */
00064   ezradio_get_int_status(0u, 0u, 0u, NULL);
00065 
00066   /* Start sending packet, channel 0, START immediately, Packet n bytes long, go READY when done */
00067   ezradio_start_rx(radioHandle->directRx.channel, 0u, 0u,
00068                 EZRADIO_CMD_START_RX_ARG_NEXT_STATE1_RXTIMEOUT_STATE_ENUM_NOCHANGE,
00069                 EZRADIO_CMD_START_RX_ARG_NEXT_STATE2_RXVALID_STATE_ENUM_RX,
00070                 EZRADIO_CMD_START_RX_ARG_NEXT_STATE3_RXINVALID_STATE_ENUM_RX );
00071 
00072   return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK;
00073 }
00074 
00075 /**************************************************************************/
00082 Ecode_t ezradioStopDirectReceive( void )
00083 {
00084   ezradio_change_state(EZRADIO_CMD_CHANGE_STATE_ARG_NEXT_STATE1_NEW_STATE_ENUM_READY);
00085 
00086   return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK;
00087 }
